jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Minimum bachelor’s degree/S1 from a top university
  • At least 2-3 years of experience in Risk Analyst/Credit/Business Analyst role
  • Excellent analytical skills, creative problem solving, and English communication
  • Willingness and ability to learn quickly
  • Data visualization (experience with Tableau, Metabase) is a plus
  • Excellent knowledge in SQL; Python is a huge plus
  • Proficient in Statistics, Structuring, Analysis
  • FRM or CFA certifications are a plus

• Dashboarding & Reporting: Meet with stakeholders, assess needs, and create reports and dashboards that provide insights on risk performance and drive consistent, clear data & KPI definitions across the financial services team
  • A/B Testing and Experimental Design: Conduct rigorous A/B testing and/or pseudo-random experimentation on underwriting, fraud prevention, and collections to reveal insights
  • Data Analytics: Conduct advanced data analyses to classify/segment users, predict repayment, and enhance collections focus and deep dive on data patterns to identify fraudulent behavior
  • Underwriting & Risk Management: Analyze cashflows, transactional, and other behavioral data in close collaboration with data science & fraud teams to underwrite and whitelist users, drivers, and merchants for credit
